caption.p: Representative histological sections of experimental ratsâ€™ midbrain showing regions of magnocellular red nucleus of nerve cells with large prominent pale indented nuclei, prominent nucleoli, fusiform and pyramidal nerve cells are seen. Cell processes are seen as well as some neuroglia. H & E stain ( x400 magnification). Group A (control), group B (nitrobenzene[NB] only); group C (NB + 200 MLVA), group D (NB + 400 MLVA); group E (NB + 400 MLVA).
